title: Collaborative Language Learning Scenario Design Using Educational Modeling Language

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience (grammar, vocabulary, reading comprehension), digital tool proficiency, and collaborative communication skills
context.additional_context: Utilizes collaborative learning tools in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, focusing on enhancing learners' linguistic expression diversity and contextual comprehension skills

learning_goals: Learners use IMS LD-based visual editing tools to design text structures and vocabulary elements for language-learning scenarios.
Learners exchange real-time scenario design feedback with teammates via collaboration tools to improve expressive and reading comprehension skills.
Learners can systematically organize context-specific language learning activities (listening, speaking, reading, writing) by applying a learning pattern library

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
